name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Cyrus R. SANDERS, Jr., Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZARPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Cyrus R. SANDERS, Jr., Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Theodore Hinckley, Helen A. Stolinas, Public Defender’s Office, for Cyrus R. Sanders, Jr.
George P. Skumanick, Special Deputy Atty. Gen., for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Cyrus R. SANDERS, Jr., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 2, 2000.
Decided Dec. 22, 2000.
Theodore Hinckley, Helen A. Stolinas, Public Defender’s Office, for Cyrus R. Sanders, Jr.
George P. Skumanick, Special Deputy Atty. Gen., for Com.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZARPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
